name: Prototype Malice

refinement_effect.refine_one: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4.5% HP every 2s for this duration.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 5% HP every 2s for this duration.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 5.5% HP every 2s for this duration.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 6 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 6% HP every 2s for this duration.

description: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.
